1.noob1: Hello friend, and good to see you have made it this far. Sit around and learn some code, I gues...
1.noob2: My tiny, mushy fingers cannot handle the speeds at which I want to type!
1.noob3: Apa trece, pietrele trec prin monitor ca nu iti merge codul si nu intelegi de ce.

2.decent1: The action of unintentionally typing characters in a sentence is called fat-fingering.
2.decent2: I have typed on a keyboard for a long time and can now occasionally do it without looking.
2.decent3: Nevertheless we are all human and we spend most of our lives learning and evolving. And sleeping for whatever reason.

3.good1: Cramming hours and sleepless nights are a well-known part of the studying ritual of all procastinators.
3.good2: 5 AM, blinds closed, mind torn asunder, eyes blood-shot and dopamine running low, the student strugges to calcullate 2+3.
3.good3: Thinking back to the days when World of Warcraft was all the rage, I realize times were simpler and responsabilities were few and ignored.
